about_the_game:
"I broke up..."
"... Hey?!?!?!?!?!"
"Really, really!"
"That - that, although it's a bit sudden!"
"Can Ab be... Mallet's girlfriend?"

Story Introduction

September 2020, Shenyang, where the story begins.
A boy named Mallet, full of longing for the future and youth, stepped into the campus of Northeastern University
Here, he met three girls who influenced his destiny trajectory
One is a lovely senior high school girl who has been longing for him for a long time, and finally opens her heart and rushes into his arms
One is another "self" in a world where mountains and rivers are high and close friends are hard to find
There is also one who should have forgotten long ago, but the remaining affection is still lingering, and a nostalgic old love has already formed in his heart
At the same time, a shadow called "epidemic" faintly shrouded this youthful hymn that should have bloomed with colors
"Growth", "reality", "confusion"... Life cannot always be just a game of happiness
Did we make another choice at the time, and our outcome would be different?

Role Introduction

Ab

CV: Li Tong
Born in 2002, a lively, outgoing and carefree high school girl with poor grades.
I am confused in my work, somewhat lascivious, and have a personality similar to that of a child.
Likes Mallet, but is not recognized by Mallet's parents.
Neo

CV: Qin Cai
Born in 2001, a very rational and beautiful girl, she is Mallet's high school classmate and ex girlfriend, currently studying Japanese.
My parents divorced when I was young, so I didn't get along well with my classmates around me, and I had some feelings of fear and love.
I have not confirmed my identity with Mallet during my relationship. Although Mallet didn't say anything, he always held this matter in his heart.
Phoexiny

CV: Ling Dongdong
Born in 2000, Mallet's senior sister is a sensual girl with loli's physique.
Very similar to Mallet in terms of interpersonal skills, emotional experiences, and so on
Described by Mallet as "another self in the world" and very reluctant to part with this close relationship

What Kind of Game Is This?

"The Memory of Mallet" is a visual novel that tells the story of the protagonist who, during four years of university life, encounters three girls who unexpectedly change the course of his life. The fates of the four intertwine, together composing this anthem of youth.

What Are the Features of This Game?

The entire narrative is filled with genuine emotions, aiming to immerse players into the roles and time periods, allowing them to experience a unique university life.
Almost all in-game scenes are drawn based on real locations where the story takes place.
From illustrators and writers to voice actors, most of the content was created by students of Northeastern University, showcasing the characteristics of the NEU.
